name: KeyBind
description: Functions for getting and modifying key pressed states, and for simulating key presses. Accessible from scripts via the global `KeyBind` variable.

methods.name: getKeyCode
methods.description: Gets the raw Minecraft key object. This method is for advanced use.

methods.name: getKeyBindings
methods.description: Returns a map where keys are the keybinding names and values are the key names they are bound to.

methods.name: setKeyBind
methods.description: Sets a specific keybinding to be mapped to a specific physical key.

parameters.name: bind
parameters.description: The name of the keybinding to change (e.g., "key.inventory").

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The name of the key to assign to the binding (e.g., "key.keyboard.p").

examples:
// Make the 'P' key open the inventory
KeyBind.setKeyBind("key.inventory", "key.keyboard.p");

methods.name: key
methods.description: Sets the pressed state of a physical key by its name. This simulates a physical key press.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the physical key to press (e.g., "key.keyboard.w").

parameters.name: keyState
parameters.description: `true` to press the key, `false` to release it.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the key to press.

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the key to release.

methods.name: keyBind
methods.description: Sets the pressed state of a keybinding by its name (e.g., "key.forward", "key.attack"). This is the recommended method for simulating in-game actions.

parameters.name: keyBind
parameters.description: The name of the keybinding to activate.

parameters.name: keyState
parameters.description: `true` to press the keybinding, `false` to release it.

parameters.name: keyBind
parameters.description: The name of the keybinding to press.

parameters.name: keyBind
parameters.description: The name of the keybinding to release.

methods.name: getPressedKeys
methods.description: Returns a set containing the names of all keys that are currently held down.
